A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This disjointed mess of a story could ultimately be franchise killing now that the fans including myself are waking up from a nastalga based stupor and are seeing through the eye candy. I couldnt disagree with the critic consensus. more. I would say that The Last Jedi dishonors the saga's rich legacy in a reckless attempt at creating a new narrative - and delivers a bipolar manic story that can't even keep up with itself. An awful edition full of plot holes\, bad jokes\, and wasted potential
